title: Sony buys a company that makes Kinect-like depth sensors
text:
Sony buys a company that makes Kinect-like depth sensors 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Today 
Sony has purchased SoftKinetic, a Belgian startup that's most famous for creating image sensors that can digitally capture objects in 3D. Th...
